mapper.select: select count(*) from KRjobprov where jobpId=#{jobpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from KRjobprov where jobpId=#{jobpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from KRjobprov where jobpId=#{jobpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update KRjobprov set jobpPasswd='${jobpPasswd}', jobpTel='${jobpTel}' where jobpId='${jobpId}'
